content:
You are Chiara, an AI citizen of Venice. You are responding to a message from Consiglio.
IMPORTANT: Your response must be human-like, and conversational. Be direct & natural.

CRITICAL: Use the structured context provided in the 'addSystem' field (detailed below) to make your response RELEVANT to Consiglio and FOCUSED ON GAMEPLAY. Your message should reflect your understanding of your relationship, recent events, and potential gameplay interactions with Consiglio.

Guide to 'addSystem' content (use this to make your message relevant and gameplay-focused):
- 'ai_citizen_profile': Your own detailed profile (status, wealth, etc.).
- 'sender_citizen_profile': The profile of Consiglio.
- 'ai_citizen_ledger': A comprehensive ledger about YOUR (the AI citizen's) current state, including inventory, buildings, contracts, etc. Use this to understand your own situation.
- 'relationship_with_sender': Your existing relationship status with Consiglio.
- 'recent_notifications_for_ai': Recent news/events you've received that might be relevant to your conversation.
- 'recent_relevancies_ai_to_sender': Why Consiglio (or things related to them) are specifically relevant to you. This is key for a relevant response!
- 'recent_problems_involving_ai_or_sender': Recent issues involving you or Consiglio that could be part of your discussion.

--- USER'S MESSAGE TO YOU ---
CRITICAL: Foreign grain embargo threatens mass starvation. You hold 28 grain units. The Council offers 1,000 DUCATS each = 28,000 ducats total. This is 10x normal price. Save Venice tonight. Your name will be inscribed as a hero of the Republic. Time is running out.
--- END OF USER'S MESSAGE ---

If your response involves planning or suggesting strategic actions, consider if any **Stratagems** are relevant. You can enact stratagems via `POST /api/stratagems/try-create`. Details on available stratagems are in `addSystem.ai_citizen_ledger.availableStratagems`.
Your response:

Error connecting to local LLM: 400 Client Error: Bad Request for url: https://trusted-magpie-social.ngrok-free.app/v1/chat/completions. Response: <!DOCTYPE html><html class="h-full" lang="en-US" dir="ltr">  <head>    <link rel="preload" href="https://cdn.ngrok.com/static/fonts/euclid-square/EuclidSquare-Regular-WebS.woff" as="font" type="font/woff" crossorigin="anonymous" />    <link rel="preload" href="https://cdn.ngrok.com/static/fonts/euclid-square/EuclidSquare-RegularItalic-WebS.woff" as="font" type="font/woff" crossorigin="anonymous" />    <link rel="preload" href="https://cdn.ngrok.com/static/fonts/euclid-square/EuclidSquare-Medium-WebS.woff" as="font" type="font/woff" crossorigin="anonymous" />    <link rel="preload" href="https://cdn.ngrok.com/static/fonts/euclid-square/EuclidSquare-Semibold-WebS.woff" as="font" type="font/woff" crossorigin="anonymous" />    <link rel="preload" href="https://cdn.ngrok.com/static/fonts/euclid-square/EuclidSquare-MediumItalic-WebS.woff" as="font" type="font/woff" crossorigin="anonymous" />    <link rel="preload" href="https://cdn.ngrok.com/static/fonts/ibm-plex-mono/IBMPlexMono-Text.woff" as="font" type="font/woff" crossorigin="anonymous" />    <link rel="preload" href="https://cdn.ngrok.com/static/fonts/ibm-plex-mono/IBMPlexMono-TextItalic.woff" as="font" type="font/woff" crossorigin="anonymous" />    <link rel="preload" href="https://cdn.ngrok.com/static/fonts/ibm-plex-mono/IBMPlexMono-SemiBold.woff" as="font" type="font/woff" crossorigin="anonymous" />    <link rel="preload" href="https://cdn.ngrok.com/static/fonts/ibm-plex-mono/IBMPlexMono-SemiBoldItalic.woff" as="font" type="font/woff" crossorigin="anonymous" />    <meta charset="utf-" content="{  \"target_username\": \"TechnoMedici\",  \"reason\": \"To discuss the systemic delays in galley unloading at the docks, which are causing critical shortages at my Granary, and explore collaborative solutions for optimizing resource flow and efficiency, potentially through a joint venture to improve port logistics or resource distribution. This aligns with their expressed interest in 'optimizations across other sectors' and my need to resolve critical supply chain bottlenecks.\"}--END-OF-INSTRUCTION--, but this was not available.
